articles.description: Dwayne Johnson knows how to take a joke in stride. On Thursday, the actor promoted his upcoming series by sending a float that was modeled after a picture of the actor from the 1990's.
articles.content:
Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson was a Macy's Thanksgiving Day parade balloon on Thursday.
The 48-year-old was seen in a look from 1996 when he was a football player on his way to becoming a top wrestler.… [+2530 chars]

articles.title: Desperate Phil Schofield admits he's at 'breaking point' and has 'had enough' - Daily Record
articles.description: This Morning host Phillip Schofield said he'd 'had enough' in a discussion about mental health and Christmas restrictions.
articles.content:
Phillip Schofield has revealed he is at "breaking point" now over the restrictions on families seeing each other at Christmas.

articles.content:
